About Me

My name is Aaron Stranathan, and I am a 23 year old web developer who is passionate about constant learning and growth. My interest in web development started back in high school, but I didn't seriously start pursuing it until 2020. My full time career is Professional Pilot; however, I have realized that it's important to have backup skills that I can rely on, and it's great that I have found another thing that I enjoy. I really enjoy spending my free time with my girlfriend, and doing outdoorsman type activities such as hiking, camping, and kayaking. Below, please find the languages & technologies that I have experience working with. Thank you for taking the time to explore my portfolio!
